title: Executive Order 8432-Revocation of Executive Order No. 5208 of October 12, 1929, Withdrawing Public Lands
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by the act of June 25, 1910, c. 421, 36 Stat. 847, Executive Order No. 5208 of October 12, 1929, withdrawing public lands in Nevada pending a resurvey, and heretofore partially revoked, is hereby revoked as to the remainder of the lands affected thereby.
This order shall become effective upon the date, of the official filing of the plat of the resurvey of the lands involved.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 8432-Revocation of Executive Order No. 5208 of October 12, 1929, Withdrawing Public Lands Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/371940
